summary: Fifteen years after his death, a carousel barker is granted permission to return to Earth for one day to make amends to his widow and their daughter.
cast: Gordon MacRae|Shirley Jones|Cameron Mitchell|Barbara Ruick|Claramae Turner|Robert Rounseville|Gene Lockhart|Audrey Christie|Susan Luckey|William LeMassena|John Dehner|Jacques d'Amboise|Robert Banas|Buddy Bryan|Harry Carter|Fred Curt|Drusilla Davis|Richard Deacon|Marion Dempsey|Harrison Dowd|Bill Foster|Robert Foulk|Lili Gentle|Cheryl Holdridge|Larry Johns|Harry C. Johnson|Tor Johnson|Bambi Linn|Edward Mundy|Mary Orozco|Dee Pollock|Angelo Rossitto|William Sharon|Sylvia Stanton|Dolores Starr|Frank Tweddell
keywords: remake|based on stage musical|psychotronic film|carousel|return to earth
title: Carrusel
